LanguageData.AAD_Gun_HellsphereCannon.label: Herald's Wrath cannon
LanguageData.AAD_Gun_HellsphereCannon.description: A Heavily modified hellsphere cannon that darws it's energy from Heralds dyson sphere gateway networks making it much more devastating.
LanguageData.AAD_Gun_HellsphereCannon.tools.0.label: barrel
LanguageData.AAD_Bullet_HellsphereCannonGun.label: Herald's Wrath shot
LanguageData.AAD_Gun_MiniShotgun.label: Black Thunder
LanguageData.AAD_Gun_MiniShotgun.description: A heavily modified Mini-shotgun, now fires anti-proton packets with it's 4 barrels.
LanguageData.AAD_Bullet_MiniShotgun.label: shotgun blast
LanguageData.AAD_Gun_MiniShotgunTurret.label: Quad mini shotgun
LanguageData.AAD_Gun_MiniShotgunTurret.description: A heavily modified Mini-shotgun, now fires anti-proton packets with it's 4 barrels.
LanguageData.AAD_Gun_ChargeBlasterHeavy.label: Herald Stormer
LanguageData.AAD_Gun_ChargeBlasterHeavy.description: Charge Blaster, but with the firing cooling and all the important parts on the other side of the gateway network.
LanguageData.AAD_Bullet_ChargeBlasterHeavy.label: stormer shot
LanguageData.AAD_Gun_ChargeLance.label: Herald Scalpel
LanguageData.AAD_Gun_ChargeLance.description: Charge Lance, but with a mile lone acceleration system on the gateway network.
LanguageData.AAD_Bullet_ChargeLance.label: Scalpel shot
